description:
Tree works in rear garden.  Works: 

 1)      Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 2)      Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 3)      Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 4)      Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 5)      Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 6)      Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 7)      Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 8)      Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 9)      Acacia: Crown thin 25%, clear building by 2.5                 metres, deadwood. 10)     Acacia: Crown thin 25%, clear building by 2.5                 metres, deadwood. 11)     Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%. 12)     Lime:   Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%. 13)     Prunus: Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%. 14)     Prunus: Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 15)     Prunus: Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 16)     Acacia: Crown thin 25%, clear building by 2.5                 metres, deadwood. 17)     Acacia: Crown thin 25%, clear building by 2.5                 metres, deadwood. 18)     Limes:  Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 19)     Limes:  Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 35%, clear                 building by 2.5 metres. 20)     Acacia: Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 25%,                 deadwood. 21)     Acacia: Crown lift 3 metres, crown thin 25%,                 deadwood. 22)     Wingnut:    Crown lift over road 3.5 metres, crown                     thin 20%, deadwood. 23)
